name: First Blasphemy
description:
First Blasphemy is a prototype made by girlsoft in 7 days. it's about killing angels. you can play it for free or donate.

goals for future versions:

  • make combat fun
  • more enemy types
  • more varied layouts for different zones
  • hub zone + cute demon girls
  • upgrade system (for player & weapons)
  • controller support
  • local 2-player
  • basically an endless roguelite fps with co-op
  • whatever else seems fun!

this is designed to be the easiest possible thing for us to make, so we're happy to keep updating it in 7-day sessions as long as people are interested. thank you for your support <3

any feedback is welcome btw
